page.title: 02Equestrian Centres
page.content: There are more horses per sq.mile in Hertfordshire than any other County. Near Gaddesden Row are:- {Husky Riding Centre:}recently for sale because international sized arena closed due to traffic protest. Offers livery services. {Gaddesden Place, Riding for Disabled: Opened Oct.1982 by{Princess Anne.}RDA gives lessons to disabled people. Has medium sized covered arena, two outdoor rings and approx. 26 ponies/ horses. Also offers riding for non-disabled people using same facilities, and they also have special events in the arenas. {Halsey Estate Horse Enterprise:}Offers livery and stud facilities.Has approx. 31 horses. {St.Agnell's Riding School:} Close to Holtsmere End school, has 31 horses.
